name: pnp-list-formatting-sticky-title-feedback-card
title: Sticky Title Feedback Card
shortDescription: This sample uses SharePoint List Formatting to display feedback items as card-style layouts with a prominent title header and scrollable feedback content.
longDescription: This sample uses SharePoint List Formatting to display feedback items as card-style layouts with a prominent title header and scrollable feedback content. Each row is rendered as a visually appealing card with a yellow header for the title and a scrollable area for longer feedback text.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
